metadata.title: CVE-2023-52353 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Mbed TLS through 3.5.1. Inmbedtls_ssl_session_reset, the maximum negotiable TLS version ismishandled. For example, if the last connection negotiated TLS 1.2, then1.2 becomes the new maximum.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
